fieldHint.hint1: ...either in your freebie or on the sales page.

fieldHint.hint1: My target audience really wants to know (how to) ______.

fields.fieldTitle: The title of the freebie / bribe you offer to entice them

fieldHint.hint1: Can be a report, video, website, info, blog post, etc.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: 5 Keys To Creating Money-Making Ebooks Fast!; everything you need to know to sell your own ebooks for massive profit

fields.fieldTitle: What IS the bribe / freebie they get when they take action?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Free Information, Free Video, Free Video Series, Free Report, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Big Prize/payoff of the free bribe/freebie you're offering

fieldHint.hint1: We've created a [free video / free report / complete report / complete website] for you that reveals _______.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: the top 5 questions and challenges every aspiring ebook author faces AND how to overcome them

fields.fieldTitle: URL where they can grab the bribe, freebie or free information
Big takeway or "reveal" you make when they click the target URL

fieldHint.hint1: What secrets or goodies are waiting for them on the sales page / blog post / confirmation page, etc.?

fieldHint.hint2: Usually a setup for whatever it is you're ultimately selling.

fieldHint.hint3: Also, on the next page you'll get all the details about how you can immediately __________.

fieldHint.hint4: Ex:get started writing and publishing your own outrageously profitable ebooks

fields.fieldTitle: Target page URL of where you ultimately want them to go BUY
Title of the product you ultimately want them to buy
Headline/"sweet offer" of the product you want them to buy
